features: Power bank is equipped with USB-C and Micro USB input ports, which can fully recharge itself in just 4-5 hours at 5V 2.0A.(Note: Type-C port can only input, does not support output) . Its portable design allows you to stay connected without being tethered to a wall socket, providing convenience and freedom wherever you go.

Portable charger with its 5V 3.1A dual USB output ports, that has the ability to fast charge two devices simultaneously. Introducing a compact and powerful that will rid you of any worries about your phone's battery life. Whether you're traveling or simply at home, this charger is your perfect companion.

Portable charger has an impressive 15000mAh ultra-high capacity, can provide you with an excellent battery life experience. No more worrying about your phone running out of juice during outdoor activities like hiking. Enjoy a worry-free and wonderful trip with this reliable companion.

Power bank utilizes a safe high-density lithium polymer battery module because safety is our utmost priority . Not only is it more compact, but it also offers a larger battery capacity, surpassing traditional lithium-ion batteries in safety standards. Your satisfaction and safety are our primary concerns, ensuring a positive shopping experience for you.

Portable charger Features an intelligent controlling IC, can automatically identify and provide universal compatibility with all devices. It intelligently adjusts the current and voltage to suit each device, effectively preventing overcharging, overvoltage, overcurrent, and short circuits. This ensures a safe and stable charging experience, say hello to worry-free charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang for your buck!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this on a whim, during cyber Monday, and it was the best deal! I bought a two pack for my girlfriend and me. We no longer have to buy other cords and chargers because this is a one stop shop product. It pays for itself!! I have an android and she has an iPhone, and it works perfectly for both! We love the colors. Highly suggest buying this because no one likes it when their phone is about to die. These portable chargers are a lifesaver. Wish I would’ve bought it sooner.I usually read the reviews before buying a product, however, because it was a cyber Monday deal and I was in need of one urgently for my yearly holiday camping trip. Once I got it, I was blown away and wanted to leave a review, so everyone else knew the quality of this product!I want to emphasize the value of this product. Here are 20 reasons why I highly suggest you buy this now!1. Holds charge2. Love the colors3. Robust4. Comes with charging cable5. Great packaging6. Perfect size to keep in your pocket, backpack or purse7. Made with quality materials8. Great power rating9. Fast charging10. Can use on android or iPhone11. Can purchase in pack of two12. Not affected by altitude13. Perfect to travel with14. I can charge my headphones with it too!15. Weight is perfect, not too heavy16. Multiple port options17. Can charge multiple devices at the same time18. Good non-slip grip and does not slip out of your hand easily19. Fantastic price point20. And the best one yet, I can pretend it’s a phone and hold it up to my ear to avoid having to talk to people!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Performance and Convenience: A Must-Have!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the LOVELEDI Portable-Charger-Power-Bank 2 Pack, and I must say, they have exceeded my expectations! With a substantial 15000mAh capacity in each unit, I was able to keep my devices charged for an extended period, which was incredibly convenient during my travels.The dual USB output with a 5V3.1A fast charging capability is a game-changer. It allowed me to quickly charge two devices simultaneously, saving me a lot of time. Whether I needed to charge my smartphone, tablet, or any other USB device, these power banks handled it with ease.The design of these power banks is another plus. They come in deep black and white colors, both of which look sleek and stylish. The compact size makes them extremely portable, fitting easily into my bag or pocket without adding any bulk.Durability is another factor where these power banks shine. They feel sturdy and well-built, capable of withstanding the rigors of daily use. The LED indicators are very convenient, providing a clear idea of the remaining charge, so I’m never caught off guard.In conclusion, the LOVELEDI Portable-Charger-Power-Bank 2 Pack offers remarkable value. They combine high capacity, fast charging, stylish design, and durability into a package that’s hard to beat. I highly recommend these to anyone looking for reliable and efficient portable charging solutions. Five stars all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great power banks!
reviews.reviewText: We bought these before our recent week long Christmas trip to Walt Disney World. They were used every day to change 5 phones! They worked flawlessly. They are light, well built, and a real life saver. With Disney being so phone-use heavy, the parks tried to cash in on their constantly requiring your phone use, by renting power banks. No need to rent anything while having these banks. Being able to fully charge multiple phones at one time sure made things easier. They charged quickly over night and were ready for their next park each day. Definitely worth every penny and highly recommend them! Nice job Lovledi!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for long trips or theme parks visit!
reviews.reviewText: Bought ours for our Christmas trip to Disneyland and I loved that it comes with two, one for each. We used ONLY one throughout the two days we were at the parks (ofc with charging them the nights at the hotel). The battery life on them is lengthy and super reliable. Another plus was that it has many options for the type of chargers such as a USB or USB-C. I totally recommend these certain battery chargers, they’re not a hassle and easy to use to charge your phones. Great for trips and if going to Disney, these are the best ones to use and they store easily! I even carry one in my purse now as a backup incase I don’t have a charger connected to my car!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, convenient, powerful, and very inexpensive backup power for your devices.
reviews.reviewText: I don't have a lot to compare these to; but I bought this terrifically well priced two pack after having bought a single one earlier. Power went out for twelve hours overnight during a summer thunderstorm and I decided I need a strategy for such outages. I got some rechargeable lamps that I keep on chargers all the time, a couple of reading lamps that have USB charging and internal batteries, and decided it makes sense to have power for my phone and laptop as well as an internet connection if this happens again. So these have an impressively high stated capacity and should run my phone which has a hotspot and I can connect my tablet to it to have entertainment and connection.With three of them I expect them to last at least a day or two, keep my personal electronics running and worst case I could recharge these with my car. And they allow for fast charging for smaller devicesThey look good (not that it matters) and they are pretty compact, about the size of a cell phone; have versatile input and output. If there's any shortcoming it's that the only outputs are both USB A (while using C and Micro to charge up) so I picked up some USB A to USB C adapters to make sure I could use a variety of cords for them and I keep them constantly charged. Not critical since most of us will have some USB A to whatever cords around.Maybe I'll never have an outage that long again but shorter outages are quite common where I live when summer monsoons roll through. I now feel I have what I need to make these events tolerable -- light, and information and entertainment. A battery powered fan should round out the needs.And they were a lot cheaper than a Tesla power wall (which ultimately is the right solution to power outages...) which I considered very briefly.
